description:
Yuji’s on his way home from high school when a red-haired girl with fiery eyes and a sword of flame suddenly cuts him down in a battle with demon-like beings that are consuming human lives. This girl tells Yuji he’s dead—but how is he still moving?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coś się kończy, coś się zaczyna
La fin de tout, le commencement d`une chose
Subete no Owari, Hitotsu no Hajimari
The End to Everything, the One Beginning
จุดจบของทุกสิ่งและจุดเริ่มต้นของสิ่งๆหนึ่ง
全ての終り, 一つの始まり
